author: undetermined
full_text:
I'll help you extract the key content from this Google search results page about Grand Hyatt Mumbai Hotel & Residences. Here's a comprehensive overview:

Location and Overview:
- Address: Bandra Kurla Complex, Siddharath Nagar, Vakola, Vicinity, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400055, India
- Phone: +91 22 6676 1234
- Spread across 12 acres of greenery
- Located near Mumbai Airport
- 5-star hotel

Hotel Amenities and Features:
- Refined rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows
- 40-inch flat-screen TVs
- Tea and coffeemaking facilities
- Free Wi-Fi
- Paid breakfast
- Free parking
- Outdoor pools
- 24/7 fitness center
- Sports courts
- Jogging track
- 8 dining options
- Shopping center
- 30,000 sq ft event space

Room Options:
- 1 King Bed: $148/night
- 1 Queen Bed: $148/night
- 2 Twin Beds: $148/night

Ratings and Reviews:
- Google Rating: 4.5/5 (26,865 reviews)
- Tripadvisor Rating: 4.5/5

Sustainability Practices:
- Energy-saving thermostats
- Hazardous substance handling
- Electronics/battery recycling
- Composting excess food

Social Media Presence:
- Facebook: @GrandHyattMumbai
- YouTube: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
- Twitter: @GrandHyattMum
- Instagram: @grandhyattmumbai

Would you like me to elaborate on any specific aspect of the hotel?
title: BJP members took to X to list the rates of various items and room tariffs at the Grand Hyatt, where members of the INDIA are staying. They took a swipe at the leaders for staying at such an expensive hotel to discuss poverty and unemployment.However, Room Tariff is Rs.12000 which can be negotiated.
vclaim: Grand Hyatt Mumbai Hotel & Residences is a 5-star hotel located near Mumbai Airport in the Bandra Kurla Complex, spanning 12 acres of greenery. The hotel offers rooms starting at $148/night with various amenities including floor-to-ceiling windows, 40-inch flat-screen TVs, and free Wi-Fi. The property features extensive facilities including outdoor pools, a 24/7 fitness center, sports courts, a jogging track, and 8 dining options. The hotel maintains high guest satisfaction with a 4.5/5 rating on both Google (from 26,865 reviews) and Tripadvisor. The hotel implements sustainability practices including energy-saving thermostats, hazardous substance handling, electronics recycling, and food composting.
